text:
Joe Newton (1929 – December 9, 2017) was an American high school cross country and track coach. He was a coach at York High School in Elmhurst, Illinois. He coached for over fifty years. He won 28 Illinois state cross country titles and one track state title. A documentary, "The Long Green Line", about his life and career was made.
Newton died on December 9, 2017, at the age of 88.
